snippet: Gregg Williams, accused of running a bounty system when he was the Saints’ defensive coordinator, is known for his aggressive coaching tactics and inspiring loyalty from his players.
abstract: Gregg Williams, accused of running a bounty system for hurting opponents when he was the New Orleans Saints defensive coordinator, is known for his aggressive coaching tactics and inspiring loyalty from his players; now with the St Louis Rams, Williams admits his part in the Saints bounty scandal and apologizes, saying he knew it was wrong at the time.
lead_paragraph: Gregg Williams, accused of running a bounty system when he was the Saints’ defensive coordinator, is known for his aggressive coaching tactics and inspiring loyalty from his players.

headline.seo: Gregg Williams’s Tactics Are No Surprise to Those Who Have Played for Him
headline.main: Coach Who Preached Violence Rewarded It for Years
headline.print_headline: Coach Who Preached Violence Rewarded It for Years
